function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding and insufficient space leading to the potential for rapid disease transmission within buildings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased building operational energy and associated ghg emissions due to technological advances in building design.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Building-related health issues due to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustained periods of isolation leading to mental health issues and social disconnection","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban inequities leading to differential exposure to unhealthy conditions","category":"Health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of trust in professional expertise and accountability systems","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive assessment of environmental considerations in building industry.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reductive and fragmented thinking in assessment methods.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simplification of the context and processes of the systems in assessment methods.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancy between predicted and measured energy use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misrepresentation of building performance in green building assessments","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental performance issues in assessment methods","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive plans for meeting carbon emission reductions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow progress in achieving carbon neutral buildings by 2030","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal distribution of ghg emissions across different types of buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low reduction of ghg emissions in certified buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anticipated increase in new buildings with low embodied and operational carbon","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low rate of building renovations that reduce carbon emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of buildings on climate change, resources, and ecosystems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in changing national energy and building codes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regulatory approaches directing attention away from underlying problems","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regulation as a force against innovation and creativity","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promotion of self-interested behavior by standard-based systems","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on reducing adverse environmental impacts in building design","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standardization leading to homogenized human experience and expectation","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for the impact of building design on contagious disease propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing human impacts from building practices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in outcomes due to co-evolutionary risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tight time and budgetary constraints in building design","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Power dynamics dictating building outcomes","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for socio-ecological system impact","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex systems and uncertain environments can lead to unpredictable outcomes, including the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of energy-intensive technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dissemination of design and development practices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of synchronization between scientific representation and social meaning","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity and overlap in top-down and bottom-up approaches","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear distinction in the risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complexity in policy-making and implementation at different government levels","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift of power from norms","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disparities in wealth and poverty and formal and informal urban development in the San Diego-Tijuana trans-border urban
